column1: #Text=The compound [Cu(pz)2(2-HOpy)2](PF6 )2 was synthesized by using conventional solution chemistry techniques,
#Text=described in detail in the Supplemental Material (SM) [49].
#Text=Slow evaporation of methanol solutions of the product,
#Text=pyridone) produces thin, rectangular, green plates, typically
#Text=3 to 5 mm on a side and about 1 mm thick.
#Text=extinguish well under polarized light and are dichroic.
